column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Pretty much every time I go to CBBR
column2: I start with the same two dishes. Dates wrapped in bacon and tomato sauce with goat cheese. Yes
column5: but both are delicious and staples of tapas food. The dates and bacon are heavenly. The goat cheese and tomato sauce is fine
column7: but i think it's just one of those you have to try.
